Topic.Title: can't stay logged in since update

Posts.EditableText: Ever since the update the site logs me out after a couple hours. I haven't changed anything with my browser, so perhaps it's the forum's cookie settings? I usually come in on the unread posts URL so perhaps that's different than most folks here (forum.textadventures.co.uk/search.php?search_id=unreadposts). Could an admin check the cookie settings to see if they look OK?
